introduction.title: 1. Introduction
introduction.content: At Meeshy, we are committed to protecting your privacy and personal data. This detailed privacy policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your information in compliance with GDPR and international data protection regulations when you use our multilingual messaging service.

personal.title: 2.1 Identity Information
items: First name, last name, and username (with change history)
Phone number and country code (optional, with verification)
Date of birth (optional, required for voice profile)

security.title: 2.3 Security Data
items: 2FA TOTP secret and recovery codes (if enabled)
Failed login attempts and account lockouts

voice.title: 2.5 Voice Data and Consents
items: Consent to create voice profile (DateTime or null)

translation.title: 2.6 Messaging and Translation Data
items: Source and target language for each message

items.title: Customer support:
items.description: Responding to your questions and resolving issues

encryption.title: 4.1 Encryption Modes
encryption.content: Meeshy offers multiple encryption modes based on your needs: (1) E2EE - End-to-end encryption with Signal Protocol, no server access to content; (2) Hybrid - Server-side encryption with shared keys between participants; (3) Server - At-rest encryption on server with managed keys; (4) None - No encryption, public conversations only. All communications are encrypted in transit with TLS 1.3.

anonymous.title: 4.2 Anonymous Users and Limitations
anonymous.content: Anonymous users do not have a personal Signal Protocol encryption key. Therefore, their messages cannot be end-to-end encrypted (E2EE). Only server encryption is available. To benefit from full protection with E2EE, please create a user account and enable end-to-end encryption.

storage.title: 4.3 Secure Storage
storage.content: Your data is stored on secure MongoDB servers with replication and regular backups. Passwords are hashed with bcrypt (cost=12). Private E2EE keys are encrypted before storage. Redis is used for sessions with automatic expiration.

local.title: 4.4 Server Processing
local.content: Translations are performed server-side via a dedicated translation service (ZMQ) to ensure quality and consistency. Audio transcriptions use locally hosted AI models. No data is sent to third-party services for translation.

audit.title: 4.5 Security Log
audit.content: We maintain a comprehensive audit log of all security events: successful/failed logins, password changes, 2FA activation, created/revoked sessions, suspicious activity detection. You can review your history in security settings.

sharing.title: 5. Information Sharing
sharing.intro: We NEVER sell your personal data to third parties. We only share your data in the following cases:
cases: With other participants in your conversations (messages, translations, metadata)
With your explicit consent (data export, profile sharing)
To comply with legal obligations (court orders)
With trusted service providers under confidentiality agreements (MongoDB hosting, Redis cache)
In case of merger or acquisition (you will be notified in advance)
sharing.thirdParty: No data is shared with third-party services for translation or analysis. All processing is done internally.

rights.title: 6. Your GDPR Rights
rights.intro: In accordance with GDPR, you have the following rights:
list: Right of access: View all your personal data
Right to rectification: Correct inaccurate information
Right to erasure: Delete your account and all your data (soft delete with 30-day grace period)
Right to data portability: Export your data in JSON format
Right to object: Object to processing of your data for legitimate reasons
Right to restriction: Limit processing of your data in certain cases
Right to withdraw consent: Withdraw consent for voice profile or voice data processing at any time
rights.contact: To exercise these rights, go to Settings > Privacy or contact us at privacy@meeshy.me. We will respond within 30 days.

retention.title: 7. Data Retention Period
retention.content: We retain your personal data as long as your account is active. In case of account deletion: (1) Soft delete with 30-day grace period allowing recovery; (2) After 30 days, permanent deletion of all your personal data; (3) Messages in shared conversations are anonymized (name replaced with 'Deleted user'); (4) Security logs are kept for 90 days for legal reasons; (5) Billing data is kept according to legal obligations (up to 10 years).
retention.voiceData: Voice profiles automatically expire based on your age: 18-25 years = 5 years, 26-40 years = 10 years, 41-60 years = 15 years, 60+ years = 20 years.

notifications.title: 8. Notifications and Communications
notifications.content: We offer 32 different notification types that you can configure individually: messages, calls, mentions, reactions, friend requests, security events, system announcements, etc. You can enable/disable push, email, and sound notifications for each type. Do Not Disturb mode allows you to define time ranges without notifications (except critical security alerts).

cookies.title: 9. Cookies and Similar Technologies
cookies.content: We use essential cookies for service functionality (authentication, sessions, language preferences). No advertising tracking cookies are used. Sessions are stored in Redis with automatic expiration. You can manage your cookie preferences in your browser settings.

international.title: 10. International Transfers
international.content: Your data is hosted on servers located in France and the European Union. If you access Meeshy from outside the EU, your data may be transferred to the EU. These transfers are protected by the European Commission's standard contractual clauses and comply with GDPR.

updates.title: 11. Policy Updates
updates.content: We may update this policy from time to time. Important changes will be notified to you by email and via an in-app notification. The last update date is indicated at the top of this page. Continuing to use Meeshy after an update means you accept the new policy.

contact.title: 12. Contact Us
contact.intro: For any questions regarding this privacy policy, your personal data, or to exercise your GDPR rights:
contact.address: Postal address: 12 Rue de la Paix, 75002 Paris, France
contact.dpa: In case of an unresolved dispute, you have the right to file a complaint with the CNIL (French Data Protection Authority) at: www.cnil.fr
